filters.label: Show Balances
filters.options:
All Balances
Debit Balances
Credit Balances
Zero Balances

name: Supplier Balances Summary
query:
WITH gl_entry AS (
SELECT
	party AS supplier,
    SUM(debit) AS debit,
	SUM(credit) AS credit,
	SUM(debit) - SUM(credit) AS balance
	
FROM
	`tabGL Entry`
WHERE
	is_cancelled = 0
AND
    party_type = 'Supplier'
AND
	posting_date <= %(to_date)s
GROUP BY
	party
)
SELECT
	supplier.name AS supplier,
	supplier.supplier_name,
	supplier.supplier_group,
	IFNULL(gl_entry.balance, 0) AS balance
FROM
	`tabSupplier` supplier
LEFT JOIN
	gl_entry
ON
	supplier.name = gl_entry.supplier
WHERE
    (CASE
        WHEN %(show_balances)s = 'All Balances' THEN TRUE
        WHEN %(show_balances)s = 'Debit Balances' THEN ROUND(IFNULL(gl_entry.balance, 0), 2) > 0
        WHEN %(show_balances)s = 'Credit Balances' THEN ROUND(IFNULL(gl_entry.balance, 0), 2) < 0
        WHEN %(show_balances)s = 'Zero Balances' THEN ROUND(IFNULL(gl_entry.balance, 0), 2) = 0
        ELSE FALSE
    END)
ORDER BY
	IFNULL(gl_entry.balance, 0),
	supplier.name
